attributes.action: urge the BBC to bring back video podcasts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC as a trial made available to those online various news programmes in the form of a podcast. One year later, they have decided to discontinue all video podcasts while audio podcasts remain. We would like to see the BBC bring back it's video podcasts (such as "BBC Breakfast Takeaway", "Newsnight", et al.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
